Led Zeppelin, formed in London in 1968, was composed of Robert Plant, Jimmy Page, John Paul Jones, and John Bonham. Often credited as one of the founders of hard rock and heavy metal, their signature blend included blues, psychedelia, and folk influences. Their most iconic songs include \"Stairway to Heaven,\" \"Whole Lotta Love,\" and \"Kashmir.\"
